name: WinterCraft: Forest Survival
description:
WinterCraft is a mobile survival adventure about surviving in the winter forest and finding your father in an abandoned scientific station.

We try to create a mix of survival, where you have to survive and maintain needs, and adventure, where you have to complete different quests, moving through the story and locations in search of your missing father.

Get resources, build a camp and shelter for the night, hunt animals to get meat and skins - it helps you will not die of hunger and cold. WinterCraft was developed by a small team FourSevenSeven of 4 people with no budget.

We are now in a global release to see if the game finds its audience. This will determine whether we can maintain and develop game in the future. We really hope so!
